title: An Infinispan .Net Core client over the Hot Rod protocol
content: Dear Infinispanners,  The Infinispan team would like to share a new project weâ€™re working on: .  Our current .NET client is based on the C++ core implementation, which is a solution that has its pros and cons. It makes it easier to guarantee parity between the C++ and C# clients over the time, but has the drawback of tying clients to specific a architecture. In turn that complicates portability and distribution, making the release lifecycle for those clients more onerous and sluggish.  The is a 100% C# Hot Rod client designed with the aim of being portable across systems via the .Net Core platform and easier to deploy and consume via the Nuget platform.  If you are involved with the .NET Core ecosystem we hope you will find this project of interest.
